cast.name: 伊萨赫·德·班克尔 Isaach De Bankolé

awards:
第67届戛纳电影节(2014)
　　一种关注单元 一种关注大奖(提名) 菲利普·拉科特
　　金摄影机奖(导演首作奖)(提名) 菲利普·拉科特

writer.name: 菲利普·拉科特 Philippe Lacôte

director.name: 菲利普·拉科特 Philippe Lacôte

introduction: Run escapes... He just killed the Prime Minister of his country. In order to do so, he had to act as if he was a crazy man, wandering through the city. His life comes back by flashes ; his childhood with Tourou when his dream was to become a rain miracle-worker, his adventures with Gladys the eater, and his past as a young member of militia, in the heart of the politic and military conflict in Ivory Coast. All those lives, Run didn't choose them. Everytime, he felt in by running from another life. That's the reason why his name's Run. Written by Philippe Lacôte
